statements: SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id > 3 ORDER BY author_name ASC;
SELECT author_name, author_birthdate FROM authors WHERE author_email IS NOT NULL;
SELECT author_name, author_birthdate FROM authors WHERE author_birthdate BETWEEN '1990-01-01' AND '1995-12-31';
SELECT author_id, author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE 'J%';
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_birthdate BETWEEN '1980-01-01' AND '1990-12-31';
SELECT author_name, COUNT(*) AS total_books FROM authors JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id GROUP BY author_name;
SELECT * FROM authors ORDER BY author_birthdate DESC, author_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_name LIKE '%John%' OR author_name LIKE '%Jane%';
SELECT author_name FROM authors;
SELECT * FROM books WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT title, price FROM books WHERE price < 50;
SELECT author_name, biography FROM authors WHERE author_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT author_name, title, publish_date FROM authors INNER JOIN books ON authors.author_id = books.author_id ORDER BY publish_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM authors WHERE author_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT author_name, biography FROM authors WHERE biography LIKE '%fiction%';
SELECT book_id, title, author_name FROM books b INNER JOIN authors a ON b.author_id = a.author_id WHERE publish_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_books, AVG(price) AS avg_price FROM books;
SELECT author_id, COUNT(*) AS total_books_sold FROM books GROUP BY author_id ORDER BY total_books_sold DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM author;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM author;
SELECT book_title, sales_count FROM book_sales ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT review_id, reviewer_name FROM review WHERE review_id = 1;
SELECT author_name, book_title FROM author JOIN book_sales ON author.author_id = book_sales.author_id;
SELECT * FROM author;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM author ORDER BY author_name DESC;
SELECT book_title, sales_count FROM book_sales WHERE sales_count > 100 ORDER BY sales_count DESC;
SELECT author.author_name, book_sales.book_title, review.reviewer_name FROM author JOIN book_sales ON author.author_id = book_sales.author_id JOIN review ON book_sales.book_id = review.book_id;

SELECT author.author_name, book_sales.book_title, review.review_text FROM author JOIN book_sales ON author.author_id = book_sales.author_id JOIN review ON book_sales.book_id = review.book_id WHERE review_text LIKE '%interesting%' ORDER BY author.author_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Author;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM Book;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM Author WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM Book ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT author_name, book_title, review_text FROM Author INNER JOIN Book ON Author.author_id = Book.author_id INNER JOIN Review ON Book.book_id = Review.book_id;
SELECT * FROM Author;
SELECT book_title, publication_date FROM Book ORDER BY publication_date DESC;
SELECT sales_date, sales_amount FROM Sales WHERE sales_amount > 100 ORDER BY sales_date ASC;
SELECT review_text FROM Review WHERE author_id = 2;
SELECT author_name, book_title FROM Author JOIN Book ON Author.author_id = Book.author_id;
SELECT * FROM authors;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT book_title, price FROM books ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT sale_date, quantity, total_amount FROM sales WHERE book_id = 3;
SELECT catalog_name, book_title FROM catalogs JOIN books ON catalogs.book_id = books.book_id;
SELECT author_name, author_email FROM authors WHERE author_id = 1;
SELECT book_title, price FROM books WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM sales WHERE quantity > 10 ORDER BY sale_date DESC;
SELECT book_title, reviewer_name FROM books b JOIN reviews r ON b.book_id = r.book_id;
SELECT catalog_name, book_title FROM catalogs c JOIN books b ON c.book_id = b.book_id ORDER BY catalog_name ASC;
